name: GYATM (itch) (Longplay Games)
description:
Short on time, low on air.

You are the first person on Mars. You will need to establish a base, mine resources, and build everything the colonists will need to survive. It's one person against a harsh and unforgiving planet where everything we take for granted is in short supply.

The colony ship is on the way. Thousands of lives depend on you!

Enjoy a small simple survival game where you race against the clock to generate enough resources in order to win. Balance is vital as buildings cannot be destroyed once they are built - so keep an eye on your resources as you explore a map full of easter eggs and fun little sci-fi nods. With any luck you'll only see the happy endings!
